text:
I*ve listened to one of these
jazz tapes, \and in my opinion,
I don!t think the show is so
red-hot good.*
We*ve got a much better jazz
program coming through from
WOI-Ames, and it*s going to
run for some 30 or 40 programs.
Why bother with this one, then?
ThereTs not that much to say
about jazz.
The reproduction of the piano
sound, incidentally, was rotten.
